Installation Instructions:

Follow these simple steps to install the India kit:

  1. Download: Start by downloading the kit from the link provided above.

  2. Extract Files: Once downloaded, extract the contents of the zip file.

  3. Locate Cricket 07 Directory: Find your EA Sports Cricket 07 installation directory. This is usually located in C:\Program Files (x86)\EA Sports\Cricket07 on Windows or /Applications/EA Sports/Cricket07 on macOS.

  4. Copy Files: Copy all the extracted files (including jerseys, logos, etc.) into the root directory of Cricket 07. Replace any existing files if prompted.

  5. Launch the Game: Start EA Sports Cricket 07 and enjoy playing with the updated India team kit for the 2024 ICC T20 World Cup!

Note:

  • This kit is specifically designed for EA Sports Cricket 07 and is themed around the Indian team participating in the 2024 ICC T20 World Cup.
  • Ensure you have a backup of your original files before replacing them with the new kit.
